title: Latetrip.com
description: Holiday packages search based on your budget and availability.
body: Latetrip.com idea was simple - provide budget per person, choose desired dates and voila! Your perfect holiday package was at the top of the search results. The most challenging part was the Information Architecture: which information is useful for the user to convince them to pick the specific package. We had a lot of fun experimenting with different variants and testing them with users.
